The Robert Graham Center, HealthLandscape, American Board of Family Medicine, and Community Health Center, Inc. collaborated to develop this curriculum aimed to introduce health care professionals to population health concepts and tools. Resources include slides and note sets, three case studies with sample data, and a performance improvement activity.
